question: Which of the following is true regarding DNS?

answers.A: When launching an EC2 instance in a custom VPC, by default, it gets a private and public DNS hostname
answers.B: In a default VPC, enableDnsHostnames and enableDnsSupport parameters are set to true
answers.C: EC2 instance within a VPC can share a DNS name
answers.D: Every EC2 instance in a VPC requires a unique DNS name
answers.E: When launching a new EC2 instance inside a default VPC, by default, it gets a private and public DNS hostname
